sections.heading: API Rate Limiting
sections.content: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage. Common strategies include token bucket, sliding window, and fixed window algorithms. Return 429 Too Many Requests with Retry-After header.

sections.heading: API Versioning - Design
sections.content: Version APIs using URL path (/v1/users), query parameters (?version=1), or headers (Accept: application/vnd.api+json;version=1). Maintain backward compatibility and provide clear migration guides.
